channel.title: Minigame not working

item.title: Minigame not working
item.dc:creator: @goodboi1112 goodboi1112
item.description:
@goodboi1112 wrote:

ok so here is the code for it to talk…but when i have my wine of zammy he tells me to go back and get it and i dont get my reward and he dont take the wine

[code]case 11: /Dark Monk/
sendFrame200(4883, 591);
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
sendFrame126(“Help, Find my wine of zammy! Please! Go out the back!”, 4885);
sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
sendFrame164(4882);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;

	case 12: /*Dark Monk*/
		sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
		sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
		sendFrame126("Thank you for finding my wine of zammy!", 4885);
		sendFrame164(4882);
		NpcDialogueSend = true;
		if (playerHasItem(245, 1)) {
		addItem(995, 100000);
		addItem(15334, 1);
		deleteItem(245, getItemSlot(245), 1);
		break;
		}[/code]

Read full topic
